entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Cache Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:15 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ashcroft 12:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 51 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -14.6°C
Wind: WNW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 4 cm over western sections. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm except 2 cm over western sections. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
